ComponentReference: The component to map to the Control Rig
TransformIndex:
An optional index that can be used with components
with multiple transforms (for example the InstancedStaticMeshComponent)
TransformName:
An optional name that can be used with components
that have sockets (for example the SkeletalMeshComponent)
ElementType: The type of element this is mapped to
ElementName: The name of the element to map to
Direction: The direction (input / output) to be used for mapping an element
Weight: defines how much the mapped element should be driven
Space: space in which the mapping happens
